Document.p: BFire stations prevent the start and spread of fire with in the range that they cover. They need to be supplied with goods and jobs to work. They do not have to be connected to transport, they do, of course, have to be within range of a market that can supply the jobs and goods. They also cost money to run.
When you put a fire station in, it does not start straight away. There is usually a three month wait before fire cover is provided.
To see the area that your fire stations cover, click on the fire station button under the mini screen. Areas that have fire cover are displayed as normal, areas not covered are just dark green.
Fire stations increase the desirability of residential areas within their range.
Fire stations go through an animation sequence every month to show that they are working.
